'''Alpha v1.2.3_01''' is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on November 24, 2010, to fix bugs.<br>
This version was reuploaded two minutes after release, without gameplay changes.

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* Fixed a bug in [[singleplayer]] mode where the game would crash when trying to load a newer version, but when the player was in the [[overworld]].
* Fixed infinite looping by disabling [[leaf]] decay.<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-11-24_#minecraft.log|"04:59:53 <Notch> uploading a new client to fix the leaf crash bug thing"..."05:00:27 <Notch> leaves won't decay, though :o"}}</ref></onlyinclude>
